aboutMeDescription:
My name is Jordi Isern, and I am focused on turning technology and creativity into my professional career.
 
My goal as a web developer is to continue learning and growing in an environment where I can also apply my skills and experience in photography and photo editing to create attractive and functional user interfaces.
 
In my professional life, I am used to collaborating in multicultural environments, communicating in English with teams from various European countries.
